ygData.subject: Re: Soft Cap on Resists (was: Patch Message)
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, just saw it.  Must ve forgot.  Well, let s cross our fingers then ;) ... balance ... point
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, just saw it. Must've forgot. Well, let's cross our fingers
then ;)

balance
